attributes.action: The EU referendum result should be rejected as a fraud upon the electorate.
attributes.additional_details:
Nigel Farage
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/06/24/nigel-farage-350-million-pledge-to-fund-the-nhs-was-a-mistake/
Nigel Evans BBC Five live.  Cannot promise drop in immigration following Brexit. 
http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/3-brexit-promises-campaigners-wriggled-8271762
attributes.background: Given statements by Leave politicians regarding immigration and the 350 million, indicate that they did not believe these claims and thus have  missold Brexit to the electorate.
